name: Pride Run
description:
Pride Run is a game about LGBTQI rights in which you guide a parade dancing to the great Hard Ton tracks trying to drag in as many people as possible.
Once you grow your parade big enough, you’ll be fighting against the Boss of the city in a 1vs1 Dance Duel.

In Pride Run you’ll be able to defeat LGBTQI Haters, taking over the world dancing to the music.

Make all the people dance using your reflexes and rhythm, or get into the strategies of the parade choosing which groups to line up against the Haters? Take your pick! Pride Run has two game modes, Vanilla and Play Hard, in which you can face different challenges and approaches, all dancing to the beat of the amazing Hard Ton music.

In Vanilla mode you’ll follow the notes sequences along the streets of the cities where the most important Pride Parades took place in defence of LGBTQI rights. An intuitive control system for quick and funny classical rhythm action.

If, on the other hand, you want to lead the parade, Play Hard mode will let you define your tactics starting from the arrangement of the groups, the choice of the Leaders to line up, the type of truck… Along the path you’ll move the segments of the parade and execute attack, defence and special moves. Lead the Bears, the Cosplayers, the Discos, the Drag Queens, the Femens, the Lesbians to have the people join in and to protect them from the Haters.

At the end of each Street View, if your parade is crowded enough and you have grown the required Pride, you’ll fight the Boss, the most fierce Hater in town. Make Donald Trump, Hello Kitty, Putin riding a Battle-Bear(!) dance and defeat them in the rainbowest beat ‘em up session ever!
